function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased recreational activity during lockdown","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission due to increased human interaction in public spaces","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, promote outdoor mask-wearing, and limit the capacity of public recreational areas.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, crowd monitoring technology, and public health campaign messaging.","People":"General public, outdoor enthusiasts, and recreational activity participants","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and city planners"}]}
